title: 怎么禁彩色字体和粗字体
author: wban
txt_content: 怎么禁彩色字体和粗字体

replies.author: 星光灬羽神
replies.txt_content:
mangaddp builder -essentials.chat.color
mangaddp builder -essentials.chat.format
输入即可

replies.author: wban
replies.txt_content:
星光灬羽神 发表于 2016-1-24 10:29
mangaddp builder -essentials.chat.color
mangaddp builder -essentials.chat.format
输入即可
谢了，彩色字体和粗字体权限忘了是什么了搜了半天没搜到
